attributes.action: ask the BBC to consider using our  license fee to buy Countdown from Channel 4 or it's original French television station if Channel 4 axe it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Countdown has been on our screens since 1982 and has been noted by Parliament as a programme that has improved literacy amongst the population, and  keeps minds active. 

As a nation, we can not afford to loose such a valued programme, especially when we are subjected to the likes of Big Brother when many of those watching it don't know where the term "big brother"  comes from. 

Please act to save such a good and valuable programme. Loosing Countdown would be a very sad day for us all.  

The BBC should consider using our license fee to buy Countdown and show it at  a time that school children will be watching. 

We call upon the Prime Minister to ask the BBC to buy Countdown.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
